example_sentences.eng_trans: be absentminded; be miles away; be in a world of one's own; be entranced; be enraptured; be transported; fall into a trance; be fascinated
〈with〉 a faraway [rapt, dreamy] look (in one's eyes)
example_sentences.jap_sentence: うっとり(と)したまなざし
うっとり(と)した顔つき

example_sentences.eng_trans: He gazed at his bride with a dreamy look in his eyes.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は自分の花嫁をうっとり(と)眺めた。

example_sentences.eng_trans: She had a faraway, dreamy look in her eyes.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼女はうっとり(と)夢見るような目をしていた。

example_sentences.eng_trans: I was completely entranced [enchanted] by the exquisite music.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: その絶妙な調べにうっとり(と)聞きほれた。
